title: FPS drop!
body:
Ever since the patch 6.23, I've been having major frame rate drops! Before the patch I had stable 120 fps from options in game. But now I have 45-70 even though I have the options set on 120 fps. The fps not stable and fluctuates between 45-70 whenever minions or other champions move across the screen. 
What is happening?!

replies.body: Ok, so I don't have fps issue when I play in windowed mode. However, when I go back to full screen mode it drops down to 40 and even sometimes 20. Anyone know how to fix this?

I have been having the same issue since they introduced the new jungle. All riot says is check the FPS guide but the FPS guide has to do with latency issues which is not the problem. 

GTX 970 
I7 
16 gb ram

BF 1 and and Ark run just fine, yet LoL has FPS issues??? Scarra was having the same problem when I was watching his stream.

What does the scouter say about your fps!  In general, I'd also recommend using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help make sure your PC is tuned up.  This includes making sure your drivers are up to date, which is especially important!  I'm glad you were able to get this fixed up!   :p

I solved the issue. 
Had to disable G-sync in NVIDIA control panel. Hope this can helps others with fps problems.
